page.title: 03Education. Pupil Survey.
page.content: Class 7 is made up of 22 girls and 14 boys.Their teacher is Mr Johnson.Most people have been at Downton Primary for 7 years.The average age is 11.Both the boys and girls have mainly brothers.32 children live in Downton, the rest in Woodfalls,Morgans Vale, Redlynch and Charlton.The tallest person is 164cm,the smallest 113cm. The lightest boy weighs 29kg,the heaviest,44kg and the heaviest girl 45kg.The average shoe size is 4.The smallest size 13.5,the biggest 8.One person in the class is left-handed and all the rest are right- handed. Three boys wear glasses and 5 girls wear them. Most people have blue eyes and brown hair. Most have a pet cat. The girls favourite hobby is swimming, the boys is sport.35 children have bikes; 15 ride them to school.The girls favourite colour is blue,the boys red.
